deploy.startCommand: echo 'Environment check...' && env | grep -E '(DEBUG|SECRET_KEY|ROBOFLOW|DATABASE_URL)' && echo 'Running Django check...' && python manage.py check --deploy && echo 'Django check passed!' && python manage.py migrate && echo 'Migrations done!' && python manage.py collectstatic --noinput && echo 'Static files done!' && echo 'Testing imports...' && python -c 'import django; django.setup(); from core import views; print("Imports successful")' && echo 'Starting with runserver for debugging...' && python manage.py runserver 0.0.0.0:$PORT
